article.title: Status and history for slv
article.para: No known problem at this time.

history.history-entry: The OHCHR site has two versions: and (reachable from the first by following the “Print this” link in the top right corner). So far, we used the second, but Mojca Miklavec pointed out that it is full of typos, while the first is in good shape. So we are now switching to the first.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
